byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: Brazilian investment firm 3G capital, which partly owns H J Heinz, is in talks to buy Kraft Foods; 3G has become powerhouse in international food brands due to daring takeover moves, like its acquisition of Burger King in 2010.
lead_paragraph: A possible deal, which would unite two of the best-known American food brands, could end up being worth more than $40 billion.

headline.main: 3G Capital, Co-Owner of Heinz, Is Said to Be in Talks to Buy Kraft Foods
headline.print_headline: 3G Is Said to Be in Talks to Buy Kraft

snippet: A possible deal, which would unite two of the best-known American food brands, could end up being worth more than $40 billion.
